title: Cardinals created by Innocent VII
text: <a href="Pope%20Innocent%20VII">Pope Innocent VII</a> (r. 1404–1406), the third Pope in the obedience of Rome during the <a href="Great%20Western%20Schism">Great Western Schism</a>, created eleven new <a href="Cardinal%20%28Catholicism%29">cardinals</a> in one <a href="Papal%20consistory">consistory</a> celebrated on 12 June 1405:
